DOC.detailed_description: The Family Smoking Prevention Tobacco Control Act enact US Congress 2009 give Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) authority regulate tobacco product . In July 2011 , FDA 's Tobacco Products Scientific Advisory Committee ( TPSAC ) submit final report include recommendation `` removal menthol cigarette marketplace would benefit public health US '' . Available evidence suggest ban menthol cigarettes US market could create situation 3 million menthol smoker would interested quit smoke majority ethnic minority risk group include youth , female smoker . However , little empirical evidence available guide treatment option menthol smoker . The primary aim study determine menthol smoker ' perception , product preference , pattern use across six product include , 1 ) mint-flavored 2mg nicotine gum ; 2 ) mint-flavored 4mg nicotine gum ; 3 ) non-flavored 2mg nicotine gum ; 4 ) non-flavored 4mg nicotine gum ; 5 ) mint-flavored electronic cigarette ; 6 ) non-flavored electronic cigarette . Fifty smoker ( African American menthol smoker ) recruit study . Participants undergo baseline assessment follow 2-week product sample phase . At end 2 week sample , subject select product use follow 2-week smoke cessation phase . This 2-week cessation phase follow one week abrupt withdrawal product . We use two-way ANOVA rank test difference rank choice among six product . We use binary variable record product individual chooses . We apply repeated-measures logistic regression generalize estimate equation ( GEE ) identify factor associate choice product . Dissemination activity occur local national level . At local level , study finding present seminar conference University Minnesota ( UMN ) Twin Cities area . We also work project staff ClearWay identify relevant policy community stakeholder audience across state especially serve priority population . At national level , abstract study finding present national scientific . The research propose current application important step develop evidence base effective smoking cessation treatment menthol smoker .
